text: CatDog is an American animated television series. The first show was on April 4, 1998. The series is about an Orange cat named Cat and a Orange dog named Dog. Nickelodeon produced the series from Burbank, California, United States."Nick leashes 'CatDog' to 40 episodes." Variety. At the Kids' Choice Awards, USA, the show was nominated for a Blimp Award for Favorite Cartoon in 1999 and 2000. The Theme song is sung by Peter Hannan. == Episodes == == Characters == === Main === * Cat and Dog (voiced by Jim Cummings and Tom Kenny respectively) are a conjoined cat and dog sibling. Cat is an orange cat and is the most coming And very pampered. He has always found of eating fish and enjoying sausages, and has an attempt to make meat even smarter. His plan sort of fail with him getting punished at the end or being awarded. Dog is the Woof dog who loves Cat and only cares about taking care of the house and his lifestyle. He sometimes get award in the end or punished, following along with the shows first episode. They are also shown to like napping and Doing Each Other, While also eating while Cat Is Still A Purr. However, they care Sometimes have a strong bonding. ==References== Category:1990s American animated television series Category:2000s American animated television series Category:2000s American children's television series Category:1990s American children's television series Category:1998 American television series debuts Category:2005 American television series endings Category:English-language television programs Category:Nickelodeon television series
title: CatDog
